subject: Simsonn pedal manager 2.1.0
description_text:
Hello,I am having problems figuring out how to use the Manager 2.1.0 software for the haptic motor pedal attachments.  When I start the manager, it does not load the indicated saved setup for the motors.  Also, cannot delete any saved setups.  Trashcan icon does not work.  Are there any suggested setup for download for specific sims (Automoblista2, LeMans Ult, etc.)?
My set up:  Simsonn pedal pros (brake and throttle), VAM Pro haptic motors (2 units installed), and Simsonn Plus x pedal control box.
Thank You.

conversations.body_text: Hi steve k,    Could you please provide us with a video demonstration and share it via Google Drive? I will forward it to our R&D team for verification.
